name: minuet
description:
if the game won't load rightclick in the game and select reload frame, this will work most of the time, but if it doesn't just download and run the html file.

pink blocks are solid

red blocks are death

yellow blocks are bouncy

blue blocks are checkpoints

golden blocks give you keys

green blocks are the end, but you can only win if you have collected the key first

grey blocks are shield blocks, they will protect you from the red blocks when you are in them
